name: Attack on the City
text:
If you are in alter-ego form, take 1 damage then flip to hero form.
Exhaust each [[space knight ]]character you control. Discard this obligation.
flavor: “It seems people in the city have a strange behavior.”

name: Doctor Dredd
text: When Revealed: Find Starshine and put her out of play. When Defeated: Add Starshine to your hand. (ROM's nemesis minion.)

name: Dire Wraith's Invasion
text: The Dire Wraiths can suck the brain of their victim, loading their memories, taking their form. Forced Response: After step 1 of the villain phase, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Dire Wraith minion and put it into play engaged with the first player.

name: Dire Wraith
text: Quickstrike. [star] When Dire Wraith attacks, it attacks the character you control with the less remaining hit points. Forced Response: Once defeated, shuffle Dire Wraith back into the encounter deck.
